please_select_timezone: Please select a Time Zone for the system to use
manual_partitioning_page_subtitle:
Use This Page to Create a Custom Filesystem Table for PikaOS to install into.
Notes:
 - This Installer Doesn't Erase Any Data Automatically, Format Your Drives MANUALLY Via The Disk Utility.
 - To Add a linux-swap Partition Set Mountpoint to [SWAP]
fstab_status_valid: Filesystem Table Status: All entries are valid!
fstab_multiple_part_mountpoint_err: Filesystem Table Error: Multiple partitions are configured to the same mountpoint!
fstab_no_mountpoint_err: Filesystem Table Error: One or more partitions don't have a mountpoint configured!
fstab_no_partition_err: Filesystem Table Error: One or more entries don't have a partition configured!
partition_row_subtitle_root_fs_bad:
Root Must be a Linux* compatible filesystem such as:
 ext4/btrfs/xfs/f2fs
language_page_subtitle: Please Select a Locale for The System to Use
please_select_keyboard: Please select a Keyboard layout for the system to use
sit_back_relax: Sit back, Relax, and watch the show.
please_read_eula: Please carefully read and make sure you consent to the following before installing PikaOS:
eula_buffer_text:
There are a few things to keep in mind: 
        1 - You understand that this distribution is -NOT- to be considered an ‘Ubuntu Flavor’. 
        2 - This is a hobby distribution, so we will try our best to provide formal support but it will -NOT- be guaranteed. 
        3 - Although PikaOS might provide identical patches and user experience to the Nobara project, we are -NOT- directly a part of them so questions and bug reports should not be sent directly to them (they dont have to deal with it!) 
        4 - While the installer is running DO NOT INTERRUPT IT! or you will end up with a corrupted system. 
        5 - Try to use pikman instead of apt when using the terminal, it is much faster! 
        6 - You understand the xone driver downloads needed binaries locally and does not directly package or distribute any copyrighted firmware or other related data. 
        7 - Automatic partitioning will format all partitons on a drive, so if you want to dualboot make a separate EFI partition for PikaOS and use manual partitioning  
        8 - In case you need the login info for this session: 
         - username: pikaos 
         - password: 
        MEANING: JUST PRESS ENTER
eula_accept_checkbutton_label: I Agree and Accept the User license Agreement
efi_error_text_label: PikaOS Only works on GPT UEFI Systems, This Machine is Booted in CSM/LEGACY mode.
pika_install_good: The Installation of PikaOS Has Been Completed Sucessfully.
pika_install_bad:
PikaOS Installation Has Failed!
Check logs for further info.
automatic_partitioning_page_subtitle:
Choose the Drive you want to install PikaOS on
Note: This Will Erase The Entire Drive BACKUP YOUR DATA!
partition_method_automatic_luks_empty_er: LUKS Encryption Enabled but no password provided.
partition_method_automatic_disk_small_er: Disk Size too small, PikaOS needs 40GB Disk
partition_method_automatic_luks_missmatc: The LUKS Passwords Do Not Match!
